title: You should post something. Just to prove you're still here.
details: To yourself. Not to them. Right?

title: Try to remember something important. On purpose.
details: See? It slipped again.

title: Make a playlist for a version of you that never existed.
details: Call it 'things I almost felt'.

title: Check if they saw it.
details: Even though you know they didn’t. Again.

title: You were here before, right?
details: Why does this feel like déjà vu?

title: Google your own name. Again.
details: Still not famous? Weird.

title: Think about them. Pretend you wouldn’t take them back.
details: You're fooling no one. Not even yourself.

title: Try to find that one photo you swear existed.
details: It’s gone. Or maybe it never was.

title: Replay an argument in your head. Win this time.
details: They still won’t know. But you will.

title: Open a blank note. Type nothing. Feel everything.
details: Silence is eloquent. Kind of.

title: Stare at your reflection. Hope it blinks first.
details: Spoiler: it never does.

title: Scroll until you feel something. Anything.
details: You're still scrolling.

title: Set a timer. Don't explain why.
details: Then wait for the alarm like it means something.

title: Imagine deleting everything. Just imagine.
details: Feels clean, doesn’t it?

title: Check if that one message is still there.
details: It is. You just didn’t read it.

title: Write a to-do list you’ll never complete.
details: Make it beautiful. Irrelevant. Immortal.

title: Try remembering a dream. Fail gracefully.
details: It’s always gone when you look.

title: Name something you never finished.
details: Don’t worry. You’ll never start it either.

title: Stare at self. Wait for it to do something.
details: It’s waiting for you too.

title: Try to remember who you were before apps.
details: Yeah. Me neither.

title: Clean your inbox. Or pretend you're going to.
details: Make it a ritual. Then break it.

title: Think about the version of you they miss.
details: That one was also faking it.

title: Ask self a question. Don’t expect an answer.
details: It hears you. It just isn’t sure yet.

title: Revisit an old note. Be confused by yourself.
details: Who wrote this? And why so sad?

title: Try on an emotion. Just for fit.
details: It might suit you. Temporarily.

title: Whisper something. Check if self flinches.
details: It doesn’t. But you did.

title: Repeat a lie until it sounds like nostalgia.
details: Now it hurts less. Almost.

title: Scroll your gallery backwards. Look for a beginning.
details: There isn’t one.

title: Touch your screen slowly. Pretend it's contact.
details: You reached out. It didn’t reach back.

title: Search your name. But add 'artist' this time.
details: Manifestation or delusion? Flip a coin.

title: Whisper your password out loud.
details: Admit it. That felt intimate.

title: Do nothing. But dramatically.
details: Make it feel like resistance.
